sentences.sContent: The ceremony opened with a fanfare of trumpets.
sentences.sCn: 典礼以一段号角的奏鸣开始了。

synos.tran: 吹牛，炫耀；喇叭或号角嘹亮的吹奏声

remMethod.val: 歌迷 (fan) 们用号角吹奏 (fanfare) 告别 (farewell) 偶像

trans.tranCn: 喇叭或号角嘹亮的吹奏声； 吹牛
trans.tranOther: A fanfare is a short, loud tune played on trumpets or other similar instruments to announce a special event
